query.commandtext: INSERT INTO RWEBUSRLOG(LOG_FLAG, USER_ID, FUNC_NAME,USER_GROUPEHd, START_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (:p_LOG_FLAG, :p_USER_ID, :p_FUNC_NAME, :p_USER_GRUOP, :p_FUNC_GROUP,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))

UPDATE RWEBUSRLOG SET START_TIME = :p_FROM_TIME, END_TIME = :p_TO_TIME, TIME_INTERVAL = :p_INTERVAL WHERE LOG_FLAG= :p_LOG_FLAG AND USER_ID= :p_USER_ID AND FUNC_NAME= :p_FUNC_NAME AND UPDATE_TIME= :p_UPDATE_TIME
DELETE FROM RWEBUSRLOG WHERE LOG_FLAG = :p_LOG_FLAG AND USER_ID= :p_USER_ID AND FUNC_NAME= :p_FUNC_NAME AND UPDATE_TIME= :p_UPDATE_TIME
SELECT * FROM RWEBUSRLOG WHERE FACTORY= :p_FACTORY AND USER_ID= :p_USER_ID AND FUNC_NAME= :p_FUNC_NAME AND UPDATE_TIME= :p_UPDATE_TIME

SELECT B.SEC_GRP_ID, B.USER_ID, B.USER_DESC, A.START_TIME, A.END_TIME, C.FUNC_NAME, C.FUNC_DESC, AVG(A.TIME_INTERVAL), COUNT(A.USER_ID) FROM RWEBUSRLOG A, RWEBUSRDEF B, RWEBFUNDEF C WHERE A.FACTORY= :p_FACTORY AND A.FACTORY = B.FACTORY AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.FUNC_NAME = C.FUNC_NAME AND A.START_TIME BETWEEN :p_FROM_TIME+'000000' AND :p_TO_TIME+'235959' GROUP BY B.SEC_GRP_ID, B.USER_ID, B.USER_DESC, A.START_TIME, A.END_TIME, C.FUNC_NAME, C.FUNC_DESC
SELECT USER_ID, FUNC_NAME, SUM(TIME_INTERVAL), COUNT(*) FROM RWEBUSRLOG WHERE FACTORY= :p_FACTORY AND START_TIME BETWEEN :p_FROM_TIME+'000000' AND :p_TO_TIME+'235959' GROUP BY USER_ID,FUNC_NAME

SELECT FACTORY,USER_ID,USER_GROUP, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LOGIN_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YY/MM/DD AM HH:MI:SS') LOGIN_TIME, decode(LOGOUT_TIME,' ',' ',TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LOGOUT_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YY/MM/DD AM HH:MI:SS')) LOGOUT_TIME, decode(INOUT_FLAG,'I','사용중',TIME_INTERVAL) TIME_INTERVAL FROM RWEBUSRLOG WHERE TO_DATE(LOGIN_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:ST_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(:ED_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY INOUT_FLAG , LOGIN_TIME

SELECT USER_GROUP, COUNT(*) CNT, SUM(TIME_INTERVAL) INTERVAL FROM RWEBUSRLOG WHERE INOUT_FLAG = 'O' AND TO_DATE(LOGIN_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:ST_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(:ED_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') GROUP BY USER_GROUP

SELECT USER_ID, LOGIN_TIME, LOGOUT_TIME, TIME_INTERVAL, 1 AS CONNECT_COUNT FROM (SELECT USER_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LOGIN_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YY/MM/DD AM HH:MI:SS') LOGIN_TIME , decode(INOUT_FLAG,'I','사용중',TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LOGOUT_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YY/MM/DD AM HH:MI:SS')) LOGOUT_TIME , decode(TIME_INTERVAL,'',0,TIME_INTERVAL) TIME_INTERVAL FROM RWEBUSRLOG WHERE USER_GROUP = :USER_GROUP AND TO_DATE(LOGIN_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:ST_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(:ED_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY INOUT_FLAG , LOGIN_TIME)A
